paper_metadata.title: Impact evaluation of the Special Program for Uprooted Population in Colombia

program_information.target_population: Displaced population and host communities in extreme vulnerability

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: the variables on which the quantitative impact of PED is measured use the difference attributable to the program in some variable that can be expressed in metric form, such as income and unsatisfied basic needs (NBI) of the household
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: this research, using Propensity Score Matching methods, evaluates and measures the impact on vulnerable population

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: beneficiary of the Special Program Uprooted, which is funded by Social Action and the European Union
evidence_citations.country_citation: vulnerable population living in displacement and extreme poverty in the cities of Neiva, Bucaramanga, Sincelejo, and Montelíbano
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: reduce the extreme vulnerability of displaced population and host communities in Colombia
